name: Spherium Finance
intro: All in one DeFi platform that empowers the financial ecosystem
introduce: Spherium Finance is an all in one DeFi platform that empowers the financial ecosystem by unifying the current scattered Decentralized Finance landscape. Spherium utilizes the principles of forecasting, investing, lending and borrowing to provide a single platform for multi-asset, cross-chain swaps, bridges, crypto financing solutions, and cross-chain interoperability.
